subtitle: These rich, yeasty buns are characteristically yellow inside. Top with sugar.

method.text: Place the flour into a warm bowl. Stir in the yeast, sugar and salt. Make a well in the centre of the flour and pour in the milk and water.
Knead until a smooth dough is formed. Leave to prove in a lightly oiled bowl covered with cling film for 20-30 min, or until doubled in size.
Turn out onto a lightly floured surface and re-knead until smooth. Return to a clean bowl and knead in the butter, eggs and fruit.
When evenly mixed, divide the dough into 8 sections. Shape into rounds and place on a lightly greased baking tray. Brush with the egg and sprinkle on the sugar.
Bake for 15-20 min, or until well risen and golden brown. Cool on a wire tray.

title: Bath buns
